Summary : A userspace implementation of devfs Summary : A userspace implementation of devfs
Description : Description :
Udev is an implementation of devfs/devfsd in userspace using sysfs and Udev is an implementation of devfs/devfsd in userspace using sysfs and
/sbin/hotplug. It requires a 2.6 kernel to run properly. /sbin/hotplug. It requires a 2.6 kernel to run properly.
Like devfs, udev dynamically creates and removes device nodes from /dev/. Like devfs, udev dynamically creates and removes device nodes from /dev/.
It responds to /sbin/hotplug device events. It responds to /sbin/hotplug device events.
